member.name: T:Quark.Contexts.Context
member.summary: Contexts provide states for the various behaviors in Quark pattern. This is the most basic Context. Since every Context must originate from a Character this Context only stores a source Character state.

member.name: T:Quark.Contexts.IContext
member.summary: This interface provides the basic properties of a Context class.

member.name: P:Quark.Utilities.Identifiable.Identifier
member.summary: This property gets the identifier string for the object.

member.summary: This method adds the given context as this Context instances child.

member.summary: Source of this Context.

member.summary: This property stores the parent Context of this Context instance.

member.name: P:Quark.Contexts.IContext.Children
member.summary: This property gets the children Contexts of this context.

member.summary: Creates a new Context instance from a given Character source.

member.summary: Creates a new Context instance from a given parent Context.

member.summary: This field stores the children Contexts of this Context instance.

member.summary: This property stores the current projectile count of this CastContext.

member.summary: This property stores the total projectile count of this CastContext

member.name: T:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController
member.summary:
ProjectileController is the class that controls the Projectile entities in a scene.
Their main responsibilities include: + Calculating the initial point of a new Projectile object. + Controlling the object every frame depending on its type of control. + Determining whether the object has reached its final destination. + Determining whether a collision is a valid hit or not in order to decide whether the hit logic of a Spell should be executed or not.
The reason this class is seperate from the actual class is because ideally, we are trying to keep the physical existance of a Projectile and the logic that controls it seperated.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.SetContext(Quark.Contexts.IProjectileContext)
member.summary: This method sets the context this controller runs in.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Initialize
member.summary: This method may perform any necessarry initialization logic with the Projectile.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Control
member.summary:
This method controls the projectile object.
There are primarily 2 ways of controlling a projectile:
- Calculating the change of position every frame. - Calculating the absolute position every frame.
This method gets the appropriate property and updates the position of the Projectile by default.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.SetProjectile(Quark.Projectiles.Projectile)
member.summary: Sets the Projectile object of this Controller.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.ChangeTarget(Quark.TargetUnion)
member.summary: This method changes the target of this Controller instance and the Projectile that's bound with it.

member.summary: This method is called when this projectile misses.

member.summary: This method is called when this projectile hits a target.

member.summary: Context of this controller.

This property should calculate the change of the position a Projectile.
If not implemented.

member.summary:

If not implemented.

member.summary: The Projectile object this Controller controls.

member.name: T:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile
member.summary: Projectile class provides interface for MissileController objects to access to properties about the projectile It also retrieves necessary movement vector or position vector and moves the carrier object appropriately It is also responsible for handling the collisions and target checks

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.NearEnough
member.summary: The near enough distance constant which indicates that a missile will consider itself reached to a target point.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.Make(UnityEngine.GameObject,Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController,Quark.Contexts.ICastContext,Quark.TargetUnion)
member.summary:
This function creates a new projectile object from a prefab and a controller in a context towards a target.
The created projectile will immediately start travelling towars its target.
member.param: The prefab of a Projectile. The prefab shouldn't contain a Projectile component.
A controller object to control the Projectile instance.
Context to create the Projectile instance in.

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile._lastTravel
member.summary: This field stores the position of the Projectile when the OnTravel event was raised the last time.

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile._previousPosition
member.summary:
This field stores the position of the Projectile before the controller is called this frame.
Used for determining the last movement vector upon hitting.

member.summary: The Controller of this projectile object.

member.summary: The Context of this projectile.

member.summary: Executes the finalization logic of this buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.OnTick
member.summary: Handles the tick event

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.Possess(Quark.Character)
member.summary: Begin the posession logic of this Buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.Terminate(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Immediately terminates this Buff. Termination assures no other Tick will take place in this instance.
If this flag is set, the buff will get removed from the character immediately

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.ResetBeginning
member.summary: Resets the possession time of this Buff, practically resetting its lifetime

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.LifeRatio
member.summary: Life ratio of this buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.Duration
member.summary: Total duration of this buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.StackBehavior
member.summary: This property stores how this buff should respond to stacking.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.CurrentStacks
member.summary: This field stores the current stack count of this Buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.MaximumStacks
member.summary: This field stores the maximum stack count of this Buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.Hidden
member.summary: This property determines whether this Buff should be hidden or not.

member.name: E:Quark.Buffs.IBuff.Terminated
member.summary: This event is called when this buff is terminated.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Interval
member.summary: This field stores the interval of calling the Tick method in seconds.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Continuous
member.summary: This flag determines whether the Tick method should be called every frame or not.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.TicksWhileSuspended
member.summary: This flag determines whether this Buff ticks while its Possessor Character is suspended or not.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1._posessionTime
member.summary: This variable is stored for calculating the alive time of the Buff instances

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1._lastTick
member.summary: This variable is stored for checking whether the Tick method should be called or not in a given frame

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1._terminated
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff got terminated in the last Tick

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Tick
member.summary: This function controls the state of the buff for whether it should call the OnTick function in this frame or not and also it checks if it has completed its lifespan or not

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.ShouldDispose
member.summary: This method determines whether this Buff instance should get disposed in the current frame.
member.returns: Whether this buff should get disposed.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.IsTagged(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether this Buff is tagged with the given string or not.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Name
member.summary: Name of this Buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Possessor
member.summary: This property stores the possessor of this Buff instance.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.StackBehavior
member.summary: This field stores the stacking behavior of this Buff. See

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.CleanedUp
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff is ready to be garbage collected

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.LifeRatio
member.summary: This ratio indicates the rate of its alive time to its total duration

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Alive
member.summary: The time span in seconds where this Buff was running

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.PossessEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff is first possessed

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.StackEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when another instance of this Buff is attached to the possessor

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.TickEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied on every interval

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.DoneEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff finishes its life time successfully

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.TerminateEffects
member.summary: These effeccts are applied when this Buff terminates (fails finish its life time)

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.DoneConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should be done

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.TerminateConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should terminate

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Tags
member.summary: Stores the static tags of this buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff`1.Identifier
member.summary: Returns this Buffs identifier

member.name: T:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior
member.summary: This enumeration dictates how a given Buff should respond in a stacking situation

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.ResetBeginning
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should reset its possession time.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.IncreaseStacks
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should increase its stack count.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.Replace
member.summary: In the case of stackign, the old Buff will immediately terminate, and the new Buff will take its place

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.Nothing
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff shouldn't respond.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.AttachBuff(Quark.Buffs.IBuff)
member.summary: This method attaches a given buff to this collection. If the given buff already exists, then the stacking logic will take place for the buff.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.GetBuff``1
member.summary: This method returns the first instance of a buff type in this collection.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.GetBuffs``1
member.summary: This method returns the collection of a buff type instances in this collection.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.GetBuff(Quark.Buffs.IBuff)
member.summary: This method finds the given Buff in this container by its Identifier.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.Remove(System.String)
member.summary:
This method will remove a buff with a given ID from this collection.
This method will not check whether the buff already exists or not!

member.name: E:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.BuffDetached
member.summary: This event is raised whenever a Buff was detached from this container.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.SetContext(Quark.Contexts.ICastContext)
member.summary: Sets the CastContext this Spell is being casted in.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CheckInterrupt
member.summary: This method should determine whether the cast for this Spell should be interrupted or not.
member.returns: Whether this Spell cast should be interrupted.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CanInvoke
member.summary: This method determines whether this Spell can be casted in the current CastContext.
member.returns: Whether this Spell can be casted.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnInvoke
member.summary: Executes the spell cast beginning logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnTargetingDone
member.summary: Executes the Targeting Done logic of this Spell on every possible target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCastingBegan
member.summary: Executes the Casting Begin logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCasting
member.summary: Executes the Casting logic of this Spell without a target. This method is called every frame while casting.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCastDone
member.summary: Executes the Casting Done logic of this Spell on every possible target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnInterrupt
member.summary: Executes the Interruption logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnTravel(UnityEngine.Vector3,Quark.Contexts.IProjectileContext)
member.summary: Executes the Travel logic on thge position of the projectile this stage was triggered from.

members.member:
Executes the Hit logic on the given point for this Spell.
Target of the hit.> The context for this hit.

Executes the Hit logic on the given Character for this Spell.
Target of the hit.> The context for this hit.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnHit(Quark.Targetable,Quark.Contexts.IHitContext)
member.summary: Executes the Hit logic on the given Targetable for this Spell.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnMiss(Quark.Contexts.IProjectileContext)
member.summary: Executes the Miss logic for this Spell.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnFinal
member.summary: Executes the ClearEffects then purges itself from the Cast context it is associated with

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CollectProjectile(Quark.Projectiles.Projectile)
member.summary: Collects a projectile which were created by this spell

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CreateProjectiles
member.summary: Creates necessary projectiles for this spell

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsTagged(System.String)
member.summary: This method determines whether this Spell is tagged with a certain string or not.
member.returns: Whether this spell is tagged or not.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDuration
member.summary: Gets or Sets the duration of the cast.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastOrder
member.summary: This property stores the cast order type of this Spell.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.MinCastDuration
member.summary: This property stores the least amount of time in seconds for a cast of this Spell to be considered successful.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.MaxCastDuration
member.summary:
This property stores the maximum amount of casting time in seconds for this Spell.
Setting this property to 0 makes this spell a variable casted Spell.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnCasting logic to run while this Spell is being casted.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnTravel logic to run while a projectile belonging to this Spell is traveling.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Name
member.summary: Name of the Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Identifier
member.summary: s Identifier of this Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetForm
member.summary: Gets the target form of this spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetMacro
member.summary: Gets the target macro of this Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.ProjectileObject
member.summary: This property stores the GameObject for the projectiles of this Spell. If this property returns null, the Projectile stage of this Spell will be skipped. Necessary components will be added by Quark upon instantiation on the projectiles.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Controller
member.summary: This property stores the ProjectileController for the projectiles of this Spell.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsInstant
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell is instant.
member.value: true if this spell is instant; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsProjectiled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell invokes projectiles.
member.value: true if this instance has projectiles; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Context
member.summary: The CastContext this Spell is being casetd in.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InvokeConditions
member.summary:
The invoke conditions. Conditions in this collection are checked to determine whether this Spell can be casted.
Possible Targets: + Caster Character

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InterruptConditions
member.summary:
The interrupt conditions. Conditions in this collection are checked to determine whether this cast should be interrupted or not.
Possible Targets: + Caster Character

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InvokeEffects
member.summary:
The begin effects. Effects within this list are applied with the caster Character object argument when the castdata is initialized
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetingDoneEffects
member.summary:
The targeting done effects. Effects within this list are applied with each of the target Character objects and Vector objects, depending on the type of the spell
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingBeginEffects
member.summary:
The casting began effects Effects within this list are applied after targeting done and casting began, these effects are not executed for instant spells
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingEffects
member.summary:
The casting effects Effects within this list are applied while the casting occurs
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDoneEffects
member.summary:
The casting done effects Effects within this list are applied when the casting successfully finishes
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void
Notice: In the CastFirst ordering, only the void overload of Apply will be called.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InterruptEffects
member.summary:
The interruption effects Effects within this list are applied if the spell gets interrupted either by the caster or other Character
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelEffects
member.summary:
The traveling effects Effects within this list are applied while the projectiles of this Spell are traveling
Possible Targets: + Points the projectiles pass from while travelling.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.HitEffects
member.summary:
The on-hit effects Effects within this list are applied when a successful hit occurs.
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.MissEffects
member.summary:
The spell miss effects Effects within this list are applied when a projectile gets destroyed without hitting any characters.
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.ClearEffects
member.summary:
The finalizing effects Effects within this list are applied just before the spell gets collected by the GC.
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Tags
member.summary: This property stores the static tags of this Spell.

member.name: T:Quark.Effects.EffectCollection`1
member.summary: This class is designed for containing, mutating and running some effects It is useful for storing event handling effects The family of Run functions return the instance itself so the running of the effects on multiple target types can be serialized like: Container.Run().Run(character).Run(point)... etc.

member.summary: Add multiple effects from another collection.

member.summary: Run the effects contained in this collection with no target

member.summary: This method is called from Unity right after it is instantiated.

member.summary: This method is called every frame from Unity. We use it to broadcast the Update event.

member.summary: Terminates the given daemon, and removes it from the game.

member.name: M:Quark.Interaction.DeepCopy
member.summary: Deep copies this collection by recreating it attribute and stat -wise. This function will not preserve any event listener or the current state of the states
